website_summaries.verdict: The Salomon X Mission 2 is a trail running shoe that perfectly caters to the needs of adventurous trail enthusiasts. The shoe received several positive comments from users but there are also who are not happy. Overall, the Salomon is still a reliable lightweight trail companion.
pros: Great traction that that stands out, especially on wet surfaces, according to a large majority of runners
The 2nd version of the Salomon X Mission offers a roomy toe box that does not only make runners comfortable, but also gives a secure fit
The X Mission 2 includes a Stretch Air Mesh that maximizes the comfort and breathability of this trail shoe
Some runners gave credit to its lacing system that lets the laces stay tight throughout the duration of their run
The Salomon X Mission 2 is a great choice for long distance trail running
cons: Has a stiff material that makes the midsole too rigid
According to a few runners, after a few months of normal wear, the shoe's mesh developed holes on it
Some of its color combinations are just a bit off

customer_reviews.title: X Mission 2 runs 1/2 size small...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn a size 12 in Salamon shoes for the past 3 years in different models and all their sizing was the same in all the past shoes that I had purchased. This 2016 X Mission 2 runs small, about a 1/2 size. I do not know if this is across the board on all there shoes or just this model. I have worn in the past the X-Mission 2, XR Mission, X-Wind Pro and all were size 12 and they were perfect. So from now on I am going to order a size 12.5 and hopefully they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Vanderstek

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe with a horrible lace system
customer_reviews.text: I know Salomons run a little narrow but these seem to be worse than normal. Once broken in they aren't to bad but that took a few days. However the bigger beef here is the shoe lace system, why are we trying to reinvent this system? Also this system SUCKS Listen if you have to include paper work on how to do something as simple as tie your shoe maybe its time to go back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Slightly tight, but stretched to fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of salomon shoes. I read the reviews of this pair before buying them and knee they would be a little tight. This style was on sale, but to go up a half size was about $25 difference, so I figured I would take a chance. The toe end was narrow and felt slightly uncomfortable. I actually stuffed socks in the toe for a couple of nights. And then I wore them hiking for about 6 miles. Now I can honestly say that they fit fine. I love the material they are made of and the quick laces. If these any length of time and survive playing disc golf. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: JAWheat411

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable out of the box. Unfortunately, the rubber on the bottom of the shoes started coming off from the sole of the shoe within 2 weeks of wear. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: C-bacon

customer_reviews.title: Been ordering my husband Solomon XR in size 9 for ...
customer_reviews.text: Been ordering my husband Solomon XR in size 9 for 4-5 years now. Never had a problem. These shoes however are way too small. Lining the soles up to compare to his old XRs in size 9, and they don't even match up. Disappointing. Why can't they be consistent with the sizes? These shoes are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and gave the support we needed for day hikes ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage son for hiking in the Grand Canyon and other national parks. He has some orthopedic issues and several minor sensory sensitivities from autism. These shoes were fabulous, wore well, comfortable and gave the support we needed for day hikes (not more than 5-6 miles) and held up to dust, dirt and wet. My son liked them so well that he wears them for everyday school shoes with his uniform. Very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Vander Velde

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are the worst shoe for running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the worst shoe for running. One shoe was smaller than the other and the bottom tread began to tear away after only a few weeks. The shoes also have such a high heel that they really push your foot into the front of the shoe, which is not very comfortable. I would not recommend these shoes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Sanders

customer_reviews.title: good shoe but they run small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and thought I could make them work. I've never(just about never) worn a size other than 10 for shoes. These are at least a half size too small. I can't comment on them too much. Seem like a good pair-should've returned them but ended up donating them.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good, but it is too small
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels good, but it is too small. I usually wear size 9. I bought 9.5 and it was too small. I feel size 10 would fit better.
customer_reviews.author: ddddd

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Bought them for my son for Christmas and he say they really improved his running. He said they feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Jrae

customer_reviews.title: I have bought Salomon shoes size 7. 5 for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Salomon shoes size 7.5 for my husband before and never had problem with being too small. This model is too tight and too narrow for men and it actually fits me instead. I am wondering if these shoes are mislabeled as Men's shoes, where it should have been Women's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melyana T.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but not long life with every day use.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes won't make it more than a year with every day use but they are very comfortable, cool, and cheap. I absolutely love the quick lace system! Buy .5 to 1 size bigger than your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: DOR

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: The back of shoe that is higher, the material has slipped down inside making for an uncomfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Vandiveer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs very small
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this shoe but I tried it in two different sizes and it runs extremely small. Unfortunately I had to return it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes in a LONG time
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes in a LONG time. Recovering from a stress fracture in the side of foot, and these shoes don't cause pain or press on foot like some have.
customer_reviews.author: Deborahb

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Salonon running shoes, and I liked this pair much much better thant the speedcross, this is a more flexible running shoe in terms of grounds as it allows you trail and city run. and also more flexible shoe. I run 40-45 miles a week. I have been using then for 2 weeks now, and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Lujan

customer_reviews.title: Warning - these run smaller than labeled size. Ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Warning - these run smaller than labeled size. Ordered 1/2 size larger because of review comments. Still had to return - too small. Will try one full size larger. Will post review once I receive.
customer_reviews.author: MOS

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size larger than other Solomon's
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but smaller than other Solomon's shoes. I've been buying size 9 Solomons for years and this is the first that is a touch too small.
customer_reviews.author: Erik W Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is too small! It is not only too narrow but also too short. My toe touched and squeezed to the front end. I have bought several other brands, never had the problem. The shoe seems to be quality built. So if you like it, buy 1 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: LCman

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the look of the shoe but my little toe ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of the shoe but my little toe felt like it was pressing on the inside of the shoe. It was worse on my right foot then my left. Its to bad because I really wanted to like these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend, He wears a 9 but Salomon runs small so I purchased a 9.5. They fit perfectly! He loves them! Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Magman8

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have been running in these for months now and they are still holding up very well. They are comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. it fits great if you follow the fitting schema, compared with your regular size. Think of them as a cross between regular tennis shoes (top) and hiking boots (bottom)...that's exactly what these are.
customer_reviews.author: fdp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit about 1/2 size small good thing I read the reviews and ordered up. Very comfortable so far.
customer_reviews.author: derik

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes; good price
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. I was glad that I readthe review that said they run a little small. I ordered a half bigger than normal and they fit fine
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 10. 5 ran a littlesmall for me, would ...
customer_reviews.text: 10.5 ran a littlesmall for me, would go up 1/2 size, but they might stretch a little with wera
customer_reviews.author: Dave P - Melbourne, FL

customer_reviews.title: Visually very nice shoes and my teen son liked the design but ...
customer_reviews.text: Visually very nice shoes and my teen son liked the design but run too small for the expected size. Returned, will purchase the larger size. Happy with the seller, quick delivery, no issues. Will use the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: really bad on the tip point of the shoe, very thigh and paintfull
customer_reviews.author: H. Rios-jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. It shouldn't have the Salomon name on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Poor quality. It shouldn't have the Salomon name on it.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 1 size too small. ordered a 10 got a 9

customer_reviews.title: Nice but 1/2 size too small
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like great shoes. Should have read more reviews. Clearly runs 1/2 size too small.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: but they fit perfect, and he loves them
customer_reviews.text: can't answers the questions as I bought these for my grandson, but they fit perfect, and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: o

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I order them 9.5 instead of 9 that is my regularly worn and still too small

customer_reviews.title: and they have fit very comfortably. I ordered these in a 9
customer_reviews.text: I have worn other Salomon shoes in a size 9, and they have fit very comfortably. I ordered these in a 9. Too small. Sent back, ordered 9-1/2. Too small. I don't think I'll try a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: In a lot of the Salomon brand shoes I buy a 1/2 size bigger. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great but after only a few weeks the sole patterns ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great but after only a few weeks the sole patterns are coming loose. I noticed today that other reviewers have experienced the same thing with the sole. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ponce

customer_reviews.title: it's like they are knock offs
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy.. the soles come off...it's like they are knock offs..
customer_reviews.author: shannon graham

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy, just waaaay too small. I have other Solomon shoes, and to ordered my usual size, but these were so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: A little small...
customer_reviews.text: These run about a half size too small. Still a great Salomon shoe!
customer_reviews.author: DTrot

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely fantastic. I have a pair of the trail running shoes and I love them. After a couple times wearing them they are broken in nicely and I can go forever in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J Novak

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, bad sole
customer_reviews.text: I got these about a month and a half ago and the sole is already tearing away from the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle gorzynski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality but have to buy a half size more at least.
customer_reviews.author: Sersul

customer_reviews.title: but enjoyed every step
customer_reviews.text: Have only been trail running in these once, but enjoyed every step. The shoes fit as expected, are comfortable, and light enough for lots of miles. Have worn them casually 3 or 4 times and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5
customer_reviews.text: Had 1 day to break in. I'm used to running shoes to be ready out of the box. This was a bit stiff at first.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but run small
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I did have to buy a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: great shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of Salomon running shoes, great shoe so far, mostly road running with the occasional trail. A little tight in the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: great grip, nice colors
customer_reviews.text: got them for my husband and he loves them, great grip, nice colors, excellent quiality overoll
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: As always salomon shoes are great and as expected. Keep in mind their sizes are almost always a 1/2 size smaller then competitors when ordering
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little tight but i think they will loose a bit
customer_reviews.author: Dr Sopa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it looks good. Only one green thread after I check it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order larger
customer_reviews.text: Great price on the green color. I'm normally a 10.5, could have done an 11, but am happy i got 11.5.
customer_reviews.author: D. E.

customer_reviews.title: Sole design is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Salomon shoes because they fit my feet the best and are usually very high quality, but the sole pattern on these is garbage. The sole is comprised of small textured squares in order to provide traction. Within a few days of wearing them, a few of the squares were no longer attached and flapped whenever I walked. After a few months of wearing them I have had to re-glue every single square on each of the shoes multiple times. The shoes fit well like all Salomon shoes, but the soles are ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Fit a half to a whole size smaller than other Salomon shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bliss

customer_reviews.title: That fits better but smaller than I expected still
customer_reviews.text: Had to go a half size up. That fits better but smaller than I expected still. But happy with the shoes overall.
customer_reviews.author: RicT

customer_reviews.title: ... these shoes and they arrived on time and in perfect condition. I normally buy 11
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes and they arrived on time and in perfect condition. I normally buy 11.5US for all my Salomon shoes (I have 2 sets at the house). These particular shoes run a bit small. I will likely order a 1/2 size up to see how that works. I will let you know. Other than that, the tread appears to be more for hard surfaces than my other trail shoes (X-Scream) which will likely have better longevity on tracks and roads but will still offer decent off road traction.
customer_reviews.author: Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, this is my sixth pair, just hope they keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: William Miller

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I would say 1/2 size too small. Otherwise a good running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Tyukin

customer_reviews.title: Fit Small
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 13 and they fit like a 12. Otherwise they looked good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph O.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size larger than what I normally wear because of other comments. Should have gone a full size larger as someone suggested. These were too small. Width and arch support (which I really need) seemed ok but couldn't wear them long enough to know for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: My whole family LOVES Salomon. Can't say enough how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iam size 10 1/2 M in all Salomón shoes but ...
customer_reviews.text: Iam size 10 1/2 M in all Salomón shoes but this didn,t fit at all. I tried size 11 and still was tide by far. Very weird!
customer_reviews.author: HORACIO BANEGAS GUTIERREZ

customer_reviews.title: Soles started peeling in less than 20 miles
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and love the laces, but like other reviewers, the soles started peeling in less than 2 months with about 20 miles of running and maybe two dozen crossfit workouts (these were gym shoes only). They also run really small. I ordered a half-size up and my toes were jammed against the front. The width was fine though. 5 stars to Outland USA who accepted my return!
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Guillaudeu

customer_reviews.title: wonderful. Just run smaller than usuall
customer_reviews.text: If the shoes were the correct size, wonderful. Just run smaller than usuall.
customer_reviews.author: TallStandard

customer_reviews.title: Hated them Return them ASAP !!
customer_reviews.text: Yuck the colors clash, But If you are color Blind Go for these !!
customer_reviews.author: Jacksdaddy from  N.C

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's X Mission 2 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Compressed EVA runs the length of the shoe for underfoot cushion. OrthoLite Sockliner is reduced odor and moisture while adding cushion directly underfoot. 3D Mesh is a breathable mesh upper that offers a comfortable, individualized fit. Protective TPU Toe Cap keeps toes safe from bruising on trails.
feature_bullets: Running shoe featuring mesh upper with zig-zag overlays at sides and one-pull Quicklace system at vamp
Non-marking Contagrip sole for reliable traction
